titleInfo.title: Roy Drusky at Salesianum High School Auditorium Layout (17801)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Roy Drusky with Kenny Price and the Stoney Mountain Cloggers at the Salesianum High School Auditorium. Poster features metal photoplates of Roy Drusky, Kenny Price, and the Stoney Mountain Cloggers. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/44832/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
